column4: hi! new dell lappy here. Any idea how i can activate these nvidia drives? The restricted drivers manager is not activating it
Oh man, what kind of video card is it?
its the 256MB NVIDIA GeForce Go 7300 TurboCache
Do me a favor and go open a terminal and type 'lspci'
this is the new ubuntu laptops dell are offering. just came today! :)
sure let me do that one sec got to run downstairs :(

The great thing about Dell's linux laptops is that they're not doing any hardware support, because they're tooooo awesome or something. It's possible that the repositories for those drivers haven't been put into the config file where they're supposed  to be.
cause im not seeing nvidia here
Just to verify that it actually is, indeed, what is advertised, and to get the numbers off the beginning of the line for your graphics card
